document.full_text: dan bylsma of the pittsburgh penguins, barry trotz of the nashville predators and alain vigneault of the vancouver canucks are the three finalists for the coach of the year award, the nhl said on friday.
document.title: bylsma, trotz and vigneault finalists for coach of the year
lines_and_colors: dan bylsma of the pittsburgh penguins, barry trotz of the nashville predators and alain vigneault of the vancouver canucks are the three finalists for the coach of the year award, the nhl said on friday.
